% 1. the textbackgournd will extends to the page boundary,
% which include the footnote and not as expected
% workaround is:
\chardef\kindofpagetextareas\plusone

% 2. the footnote can't process linebreak correctly
% workaround is:
%\let\stdfootnote\footnote
%\def\footnote#1{%
%\stdfootnote{\setscript[hanzi]#1}%
%}
% \postponenotes\footnote{...}

% 3. 中文caption第一行字符中间有空格
% workaround is:
\setupcaptions[align={broad,middle}]

% 4. \underbar{\space} is invlaid
% \underbar is fixed black
\define\uerbarspace{\color[black]{\hl[.5]}}

\define[1]\todo{}
%\define[1]\todo{\error}
\define[1]\problem{}
